docs.text:
Event




Resource URL


GET /event



Description


Get list of events


Parameters





    
q

    
Event name or company name





Example Response


{
    
current_page
: 1,
    
data
: [
        {
            
company_name
: 
Revision Live
,
            
created_at
: 
2017-02-23 14:38:25
,
            
deleted_at
: null,
            
details
: 
,
            
email
: 
yudhaarif@gmail.com
,
            
end_datetime
: 
2017-05-07 23:59:00
,
            
event_name
: 
Hammersonic
,
            
first_name
: 
Yudha
,
            
id
: 1,
            
last_name
: 
Budiman
,
            
owner
: 1,
            
phone
: 
0818834315
,
            
start_datetime
: 
2017-05-07 19:00:00
,
            
ticket_quota
: 100,
            
updated_at
: 
2017-02-23 14:38:25
,
            
venue
: 
Jakarta

        }
    ],
    
from
: 1,
    
last_page
: 1,
    
next_page_url
: null,
    
per_page
: 25,
    
prev_page_url
: null,
    
to
: 1,
    
total
: 1
}






Resource URL


POST /event/create



Description


Create an event


Parameters





    
name

    
Name of the contact person





    
email

    
Contact person's e-mail





    
phone

    
10-12 characters





    
event_name

    
Name of the event





    
company_name

    
Name of the company





    
ticket_quota

    
Allowed value 1-2000





    
start_date

    
Format yyyy-mm-dd





    
start_time

    
Format hh:mm





    
end_date

    
Format yyyy-mm-dd





    
end_time

    
Format hh:mm





    
venue

    
Name of the venue






Example Response


{
    
status
: 
success
,
    
message
: 
Event Anda berhasil disimpan!

}

docs.text:
Reservation




Resource URL


GET /reservation



Description


Get list of reservations


Example Response







Resource URL


GET /reservation/create/{event_id}/register



Description


Pre-checking a reservation whether the selected tickets are available or not


Parameters





    
ticket_class_id

    
Ticket class ids





    
ticket

    
Number of tickets for each ticket class






Example Response


{
    
event
: {
        
company_name
: 
Revision Live
,
        
created_at
: 
2017-02-23 14:38:25
,
        
deleted_at
: null,
        
details
: 
,
        
email
: 
yudhaarif@gmail.com
,
        
end_datetime
: 
2017-05-07 23:59:00
,
        
event_name
: 
Hammersonic
,
        
first_name
: 
Yudha
,
        
id
: 1,
        
last_name
: 
Budiman
,
        
owner
: 1,
        
phone
: 
0818834315
,
        
start_datetime
: 
2017-05-07 19:00:00
,
        
ticket_quota
: 100,
        
updated_at
: 
2017-02-23 14:38:25
,
        
venue
: 
Jakarta

    },
    
event_date
: 
7 May 2017 19:00
,
    
event_id
: 
1
,

58af00dc57b1c1.43859931
,
    
ticket_class_ids
: [
        
1

    ],
    
tickets
: [
        
1

    ],
    
total_price
: 365000,
    
with_seat_number
: false
}






Resource URL


POST /reservation/create/{event_id}/verify



Description


Verify a reservation


Parameters





    
name

    
Visitor's name





    
id_no

    
KTP/SIM/Passport





    
email

    
Visitor's email





    
phone

    
Visitor's phone (10-12 characters)





    
birthdate

    
Format: yyyy-mm-dd





    
sex

    
M/F





    
info

    
Where the visitor got the information from





    
ticket_class_id

    
Ticket class ids





    
ticket

    
Number of tickets for each ticket class






Example Response


{
    
status
: 
success
,
    
message
: 
Pemesanan dapat dilakukan

}






Resource URL


POST /reservation/create_token



Description


Post the reservation data to Veritrans Snap API


Parameters





    
reservation_code

    
Auto-generated





    
total_price

    
Gross amount that should be paid





    
name

    
Visitor's name





    
email

    
Visitor's email





    
phone

    
Visitor's phone (10-12 characters)





    
ticket_class_id

    
Ticket class ids





    
ticket

    
Number of tickets for each ticket class






Example Response


Snap token

docs.text:
Ticket




Resource URL


GET /event/{event_id}/ticket



Description


Get list of ticket classes for an event


Example Response


[
    {
        
active
: 1,
        
created_at
: 
2017-02-23 14:38:25
,
        
deleted_at
: null,
        
end_of_sales
: 
2017-05-06 23:59:00
,
        
event_id
: 1,
        
id
: 1,
        
name
: 
Early Bird
,
        
price
: 365000,
        
qty
: 50,
        
updated_at
: 
2017-02-23 14:38:25

    },
    {
        
active
: 1,
        
created_at
: 
2017-02-23 14:38:25
,
        
deleted_at
: null,
        
end_of_sales
: 
2017-05-06 23:59:00
,
        
event_id
: 1,
        
id
: 2,
        
name
: 
Presale
,
        
price
: 405000,
        
qty
: 50,
        
updated_at
: 
2017-02-23 14:38:25

    }
]






Resource URL


POST /event/ticket/create



Description


Create a ticket class for an event


Parameters





    
name

    
Name of the ticket class





    
price

    
Price of the ticket





    
qty

    
Ticket's quota





    
end_of_sales

    
Format: yyyy-mm-dd





    
event_id

    
Event ID






Example Response


{
    
status
: 
success
,
    
message
: 
Tiket baru berhasil ditambahkan!

}
